text:
Tesla will show an electric pickup Cybertruck November 21
06 Nov 2019, 19:44 by Artyom Bausov
Elon Musk confirmed on his Twitter that Tesla will show its electric pickup truck on November 21. The founder named the new product Cybertruck.



The car will be presented at the Tesla design studio in Los Angeles, California, which is located on the same site as the headquarters of SpaceX.
Tesla will unveil its "Cybertruck" electric pickup on November 21st Elon Musk has called the supposedly Blade Runner design "heart-stopping." www.theverge.com
